multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the “COVID-19 Surveillance (Aggregate)” dashboard. Find the chart “COVID-19 - Active and Closed Cases - Monthly”.

label.h3: What type of chart is this visualization?

div.p: The “COVID-19 - Active and Closed Cases - Monthly” visualization is a stacked column chart. If you open this visualization in the Data Visualizer app, the chart type can be found in the upper right-hand corner of the app.
